last_episode_to_air.name: Lucy Fights the System
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a middle aged waitress is fired solely based on her age, Lucy and Kim scheme to cause chaos for the restaurant manager.

name: Here's Lucy
overview: Here's Lucy is Lucille Ball's third network television sitcom. It ran on CBS from 1968 to 1974.

episodes.name: Mod, Mod Lucy
episodes.overview: Cheapskate Uncle Harry hire's his nephew & neice, Craig and Kim, as the band needed by a client at the Unique Employment Agency.  Lead vocalist Kim develops laryngitis, however, and mom Lucy, decked out in modern fashions,  fills in for her.

episodes.name: Lucy Visits Jack Benny
episodes.overview: The Carter family vacations in Jack Benny's desert mansion.  Percieved as a budget getaway, Benny loads charge after charge to up the bill.  This exceptional episode has a cameo by Jackie Gleason playing his classic Ralph Kramden character from the Honeymooners.

episodes.name: Lucy the Process Server
episodes.overview: Lucy confuses a bank deposit and a summons.  Amusing episode borrowing on older Lucille Ball plots.

episodes.name: Lucy and Miss Shelly Winters
episodes.overview: A movie producer is worried when an actress' pre-filming jitters is subdued by over-eating.  Lucy, after contacted at the Unique Employeement Agency, moves in with actress Shelly to help her with a crash diet.

episodes.name: Lucy the Conclusion Jumper
episodes.overview: Lucy jumps to the wrong conclusion!  Daughter Lucie is working on a  school project about teenage marriage, and Lucy fears she is about to elope.

episodes.name: Lucy's Impossible Mission
episodes.overview: The first of several episodes of Here's Lucy that has her working undercover.  This episode is based on the long running Desilu tv show, Mission Impossible, and features the Carter family impersonating Middle Eastern royalty.

episodes.name: Lucy and Eva Gabor
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry sends screenplay author Eva Von Kirsten to hide out at Lucy's home as a safe haven to complete her latest work.  As usual, Lucy takes her job very seriously.

episodes.name: Lucy's Birthday
episodes.overview: The kids take Lucy out for a birthday dinner.  Unfortunately, Craig forgets to bring his money, and Lucy schemes to get out of paying the bill.

episodes.name: Lucy Sells Craig to Wayne Newton
episodes.overview: Lucy schemes to get Craig a job as Wayne Newton's drummer.

episodes.name: Lucy's Working Daughter
episodes.overview: Over protective mom Lucy watches over Lucie at her new after school job.

episodes.name: Guess Who Owes Lucy $23.50?
episodes.overview: Unoriginal Van Johnson episode where Lucy Carter uses a Van Johnson look=alike (played by Johnson, of course) to masquerade as the movie star.

episodes.name: Lucy the Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Lucy uses a computer dating service--for Uncle Harry.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Gold Rush
episodes.overview: Lucy discovers gold?  Of course not, but she thinks so and the gold rush begins.

episodes.name: Lucy the Fixer
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry requires Lucille to work on Saturday at his house.  By the end of the day, his house is a shambles.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Ex-Con
episodes.overview: Lucy goes undercover (as an old lady) to catch the crook of a robbery she may have caused.  Wally Cox guest stars as a security guard.

episodes.name: Lucy Goes on Strike
episodes.overview: Lucy thinks Harry is trying to murder her!?!  Even worse than the 1st episode of I Love Lucy in 1951 in which Lucy thinks Ricky is trying to murder her!

episodes.name: Lucy and Carol Burnett
episodes.overview: One of Lucille Ball's variety shows, and with Carol Burnette to boot!

episodes.name: Lucy and the Great Airport Chase
episodes.overview: Waaaayyy out there episode involving secret formulas, suicide, secret agents, and a keystone cops style chase scene.

episodes.name: A Date for Lucy
episodes.overview: The kids fix Mom Lucy up with a latin hunk who turns out to be a jewel thief.

episodes.name: Lucy the Shopping Expert
episodes.overview: Family oriented episode revolving around the supermarket.

episodes.name: Lucy Gets Her Man
episodes.overview: Lucy must go undercover . . . huh, wait. . . that was episode numbers . . . . no, no this time she's a spy.

episodes.name: Lucy's Safari
episodes.overview: Lucy and family try to catch a Gorboona.

episodes.name: Lucy and Tennessee Ernie's Fun Farm
episodes.overview: Stale episode rehashing old Tennessee Ernie/Lucy plots from her previous series-hillbilly music and down on his luck Ernie.

episodes.name: Lucy Helps Craig Get a Driver's License
episodes.overview: Craig celebrates his 16th birthday.  Naturally, he can't wait to get his drivers license.  Mom Lucille naturally interferes.

episodes.name: Lucy Joins the Air Force Academy (1)
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry is hired to drive a motor home from California to Colorado, and foolishly agrees to take Lucy and the kids along for the ride.  Lucy takes over driving so Harry can take a nap, and decides to take a detour, setting up this and the following three episodes.

episodes.name: Lucy Joins the Air Force Academy (2)
episodes.overview: Lucy is still trying as hard as she can to get Craig into the Air Force Academy, and each result ends hilariously.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Indian Chief
episodes.overview: Lucy indadvertently ends up marrying an Indian Chief who gives her the state of Utah as a wedding gift!

episodes.name: Lucy Runs the Rapids
episodes.overview: While camping outdoors near a river, Lucy's mattress gets carried away with the current, with Kim, Craig, and Harry trying to rescue her.

episodes.name: Lucy and Harry's Tonsils
episodes.overview: Lucy, Kim, and Craig attempt to keep Uncle Harry in the hospital after having his tonsils taken out.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Andrews Sisters
episodes.overview: Lucy and Kim fill in for two of Patty Andrews' Sisters

episodes.name: Lucy's Burglar Alarm
episodes.overview: After a rash of neighborhood burglaries,  Lucille, Kim, and Craig install an home-made alarm system.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Used Car Dealer
episodes.overview: Needing another means of transportation, Kim and Craig buy an old broken down car from Cheerful Charlie, the local car salesman.  When the car no longer works, Lucy and Harry scheme to get Charlie to take it back for more than it's worth.

episodes.name: Lucy the Cement Worker
episodes.overview: When Lucille loses an antique ring in wet cement, she disguises herself as a cement worker wielding a jackhammer.

episodes.name: Lucy and Johnny Carson
episodes.overview: Lucy appears on the Johnny Carson show and plays ""stump the band"", and wins a dinner at the Brown Derby.  Unfortunately for Johnny Carson,  Lucy and Uncle Harry coincidentally dine at the Brown Derby when Carson and McMahon are also dining.  Naturally, Lucy believes she must have won a dinner with Johnny and Ed and joins them.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Generation Gap
episodes.overview: Kim and Craig are in charge of producing the school play, and decide its theme should be the Generation Gap.  When they have casting problems, Lucy and Harry wind up playing the parents, and they all put on a really spectacular show.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Bogie Affair
episodes.overview: The kids find a lost sheep dog and bring it home.  After naming the sheep dog Humphrey Bogart, a litter of puppies are born.  After the puppies are giving to new homes, Uncle Harry arrives with a want ad offering a reward.

episodes.name: Lucy Protects Her Job
episodes.overview: Harry suggests Lucy is overworked and should hire an assistant.  Suspecting Harry is really attempting to replace her, Lucy has Kim arrive to the office as temp secretary Shoiley Shopenauer, the world's worst office assistant.

episodes.name: Lucy the Helpful Mother
episodes.overview: The kids acquire part-time jobs to pay for a new phone line, but Lucy ends up filling in for them.

episodes.name: Lucy and Liberace
episodes.overview: Craig's scavenger hunt finds a candlelabra that appears to have belonged to Liberace.  Lucy feels obliged to return it to the famous pianist.

episodes.name: Lucy the Laundress
episodes.overview: When Lucy's drives into a Chinese Laundry, she takes a part time job there to pay for the damages.

episodes.name: Lucy and Lawrence Welk
episodes.overview: Lucy brags to Viv that she knows Lawrence Welk personally, and then schemes to introduce her to the bandleader, whom she has actually never met.

episodes.name: Lucy and Viv Visit Tijuana
episodes.overview: Lucy and her friend Vivian Jones want to visit Tijuana, and get Harry to drive them, which leads to another classic Lucy-Viv situation.

episodes.name: Lucy and Ann-Margret
episodes.overview: Ann-Margret likes Desi's new song, and wants to duet with him on her upcoming television show.

episodes.name: Lucy and Wally Cox
episodes.overview: Lucy schemes to help change a father's image of his son.

episodes.name: Lucy and Wayne Newton
episodes.overview: While in Las Vegas, Lucy and family return a lost horse to singer Wayne Newton.

episodes.name: Lucy Takes Over
episodes.overview: Lucy, Kim, and Craig find an old promisory note indicating Uncle Harry owes them a great deal of money.

episodes.name: Lucy and Carol Burnett
episodes.overview: Lucy and her friend Carol Krausmeyer both end up entering the local Secretary Beautiful Contest, causing a rivalry between them.  They both make fools of themselves at the contest trying to prove which woman is better.

episodes.name: Lucy Meets the Burtons
episodes.overview: Richard Burton, the movie star, escapes riotous fans by wearing a plumber's disguise.  Lucy Carter mistakes him for a much needed plumber.  Sam (Burton), the plumber, escapes to the Carter household.  Lucy later finds a remarkable diamond ring in his discarded over-alls.  By the time Lucy discovers it is THE famous Elizabeth Taylor diamond ring, it is already stuck on her finger.  The end result is a creshendo of comedy as Liz feverishly tries to get the ring off Lucy's finger.  Ultimately, Lucy's arms are used as Liz Taylor's while Richard & Liz do a scheduled  press conference.

episodes.name: Lucy the Skydiver
episodes.overview: Lucy threatens to take up skydiving if her kids don't drop their dangerous activities, but Harry convinces her to actually do it as publicity for the Employment Agency.

episodes.name: Lucy and Sammy Davis, Jr.
episodes.overview: Lucy ends up hitting Sammy Davis Jr. while opening the door to the employment agency and it hits his nose which causes him to threaten to sue Harry and Lucy if his nose looks different for the movie he is filming.

episodes.name: Lucy the Crusader
episodes.overview: When Lucy buys Craig a record player for his birthday it ends up not working right, so Lucy brings it back to the store but they won't accept it back which causes Lucy and other victims of the companies defective products to present their case in front of shareholders.

episodes.name: Lucy, the American Mother
episodes.overview: Craig produces a documentary focusing on his family, who become self-conscious of the camera.

episodes.name: Lucy's Wedding Party
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry is away, so Lucy borrows his home for a Greek couple's wedding . . . .

episodes.name: Lucy, the Diamond Cutter
episodes.overview: Lucy attempts to sooth the nerves of a nervous diamond cutter.

episodes.name: Lucy and Jack Benny's Biography
episodes.overview: Harry sends Lucy to Jack Benny's house where she writes down his biography.  Important and significant events throughout his life like him as a child practicing violin to being in the navy to shows with Gracie Allen.

episodes.name: Lucy Loses Her Cool
episodes.overview:
Lucy is chosen on an audience participation game show.  The host offers her $500 if she won't lose her temper for a week.

When she's escorted off the stage, the host then brings out Harry & the kids, offering them $500 if they can make Lucy lose her temper!

They do everything possible to make Lucy lose, but she overcomes temptation.  Lucy manages to demolish a grocery store!

The week passed.  Lucy's back on the game show where the host awards her $500.  But then, the manager of the grocery store enters & charges her $499.99 in damages, leaving her with 1 penny!  Lucy gets mad & cries until the host reveals that her friends/family were in this charade & award her another $500!

episodes.name: Lucy and Flip Go Legit
episodes.overview: Lucy convinces Flip Wilson to play the part of Prissy in a local production of Gone With the Wind, with Harry as Rhett Butler, Lucy as Scarlett O'Hara, and Kim as Melanie.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Mountain Climber
episodes.overview: Lucy bets Harry's business partner that she can beat him at mounting climbing.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Italian Bombshell
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry's ex-flame Donna is coming to town, and Harry begins to worry about his appearance.

episodes.name: Lucy and Mannix Are Held Hostage
episodes.overview: Lucy hires detective Joe Mannix.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Astronauts
episodes.overview: Lucy must go through decontamination with Astronauts when she makes physical contact with them after a landing.

episodes.name: Lucy Makes a Few Extra Dollars
episodes.overview: Lucy and Kim attempt to make Uncle Harry guilty for not giving Lucy a pay raise.

episodes.name: Someone's On the Ski Lift with Dinah
episodes.overview: Lucy encounters Dinah Shore while on a ski trip. The two get stuck together on a ski lift, where Lucy proceeds to sing a medley of Dinah's hits to her, and otherwise annoy the singer.

episodes.name: Lucy and Her All-Nun Band
episodes.overview: Lucy takes saxophone lessons to join a band.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Celebrities
episodes.overview: Lucy and Uncle Harry seek celebrities for a radio campaign when a competitor makes a dent in their business.  Kim's boyfriend is an impressionist (Rich Little), and offers his services.

episodes.name: Won't You Calm Down, Dan Dailey?
episodes.overview: Lucy goes to work for movie star Dan Dailey, who pleads with Uncle Harry to take her back at the Unique Employment Agency.

episodes.name: Ginger Rogers Comes to Tea
episodes.overview: Lucille and Uncle Harry attend a Ginger Rogers film festival. Ms. Rogers attends in disguise, and is seated next to ""you-know-who"".  When Lucille offends Ms. Rogers, she leaves the theater, but also leaves her purse.  Discovering the true identity to the stranger, Harry & Lucy plot to return the purse to meet her again.

episodes.name: Lucy Helps David Frost Go Night-Night
Lucy in the Jungle
episodes.overview: The family vacation in Africa.

episodes.name: Lucy and Candid Camera
episodes.overview: The family believes they are on Candid Camera, but in actuality, the are assisting a robbery.

episodes.name: Lucy's Lucky Day
episodes.overview: Lucy is a game show contestant.

episodes.name: Lucy's Bonus Bounces
episodes.overview: Lucy flips a psychiatrists advice to Harry that she needs a raise, thinking Uncle Harry has something else up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Little Old Lady
episodes.overview: When an old lady comes in the enployment agency looking for a job because she has nowhere to go, Lucy decides to let her stay at her house. When Mrs. Brady sells land to Harry, Kim tells them about a similar sounding scam which gives Lucy and Harry the idea to let the Mrs. Brady have a seance in which they dress up as Napoleon and Josephine to convince her to refund Harry his money.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Chinese Curse
episodes.overview: Lucy saves a man's life, and according to Chinese custom, he is indepted to her.  Lucy and Kim sheme to correct an annoying situation.

episodes.name: Lucy's Replacement
episodes.overview: Harry gets a new office computer, and finds Lucy obsolete.  Out of work Lucy get a new job and hates it!  Lucy and Kim scheme to make the computer obsolete.

episodes.name: Kim Moves Out
episodes.overview: Kim has decided it is time for her to move out of the house, but Lucy becomes an annoying mother hen.  Ultimately, Kim plans to teach Mother a lesson.

episodes.name: Lucy Sublets the Office
episodes.overview: Lucy is promoted to office manager, and looks for ways to save money.  Her solution is to sublet half the office to a toy maker.

episodes.name: Lucy's Punctured Romance
episodes.overview: Lucy has a new boyfriend, but Kim and Uncle Harry are worried.  The milkman doesn't help matters when he informs the pair the Lucy's boyfriend is a playboy.

episodes.name: With Viv As a Friend, Who Needs an Enemy?
episodes.overview: Viv shows up for a surprise visit, and tells Lucy she may stay in California for a year, but everything goes awry when Harry fires Lucy and hires Viv in her place, making Lucy furious.  After a few weeks, Harry can't stand Viv and Viv can't stand Harry.  Lucy comes up with a scheme to get Viv to quit, but Kim blabs the whole thing to Viv.  In the end, everything ends up back the way it was.

episodes.name: Kim Finally Cuts You-Know-Who's Apron Strings
episodes.overview: Kim moves into her own apartment (one managed by Lucy's brother) and deals with neighbors and lecherous men.

episodes.name: Lucy's Big Break
episodes.overview: Lucy Carter breaks her leg, and is in the hospital.  She is attracted to a doctor, and attempts to get his affection.

episodes.name: Lucy and Eva Gabor Are Hospital Roomies
episodes.overview: Lucy's new hospital mate (Eva Gabor) has broken her foot, and steals the attention from Lucy.

episodes.name: Harrison Carter, Male Nurse
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry plays nurse when Lucy arrives home from the hospital.

episodes.name: A Home Is Not An Office
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry is lost without Lucille, and moves the office to her house while she is recovering.

episodes.name: Lucy and Joe Namath
episodes.overview: Craig is home from college.  While playing tennis, a football coach suspects he may also make a great quarterback.  But can even Joe Namath convince Lucy this is best for Craig?

episodes.name: The Case of the Wreckless Wheelchair Driver
episodes.overview: Lucy is involved in a lawsuit when a young man is flattened by Lucy's wheelchair.  Kim proves the guy is faking.

episodes.name: Lucy, the Other Woman
episodes.overview: The milkman's wife thinks Lucy is having an affair with her husband.

episodes.name: Lucy and Petula Clark
episodes.overview: Lucy tricks Harry into sending her to be Petula Clark's ""Girl Friday"" to assist with a recording session.  Lucy's over protection of pregnant Clark nearly wrecks the entire session, but ends by becoming the new gimmick for her record, a human ""waa waa petal"".

episodes.name: Lucy and Jim Bailey
episodes.overview: Lucie and Jim Bailey perform for a Chamber of Commerce event.  Jim Bailey impersonates Phyllis Diller.

episodes.name: Lucy and Dirty Gertie
episodes.overview: After cleaning her fireplace, Lucy takes a crate of apples down to a neighbor.  She is mistaken for Dirty Gertie by a crook who enlists the homeless woman for good luck.  Lucy is asked to go undercover to held apprehend the criminal.

episodes.name: Lucy and Donny Osmond
episodes.overview: Lucy and Kim attend a Donny Osmond concert with cousin Patricia (Eve Plumb), who is crazy for the 14 year old singer.  Donny, spots Kim in the audience, and he falls in love at first sight.  Kim believes the flowers and letters are for Patricia, but soon discovers the mix-up.  Realizing Donny volunteered to perform at Kim's Charity function because of the mix-up, Kim feels obligated to set the record straight.

episodes.name: Lucy and Her Prince Charming
episodes.overview: A visiting latin Prince falls for Lucy.  Uncle Harry sees dollar signs and encourages her to marry him.

episodes.name: My Fair Buzzi
episodes.overview: In preparation for an audition, Kim's friend Ruth get a makeover from Lucy and Kim.  Unfortunately, the director wants a less attractive actress, much like Ruth before the makeover.  Nonetheless, all three get hired for a 1920's style production.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Group Encounter
episodes.overview: Mary Jane suggests Lucy and Harry go to group therapy to improve their working relationship.  Once in therapy, the psychiatrist suggest the two reverse roles to see how the other one feels.

episodes.name: Lucy Is Really In a Pickle
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry recruits Lucy and Kim to don pickle costumes and perform in a television commercial, but as filming is about to begin, Lucy is nowhere to be found, as she finds herself caught up in yet another Lucy-style mishap.

episodes.name: Lucy Goes on Her Last Blind Date
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry tries to marry off Lucy to a rich relative, Uncle Ben.  Once again, Lucy isn't intrested.

episodes.name: Lucy and Her Genuine Twimby
episodes.overview: While antique shopping, Lucy purchases an  antique reproduction.  The dealer, however, has made a mistake and sold Lucy an original, rare antique, and romances Lucy in hopes of retrieving the chair.

episodes.name: Lucy Goes to Prison
episodes.overview: Lucy goes undercover again, this time to prison.  Lucy attempts to get needed information from a cell mate, but has little luck until Lucy fills her with alcohol.

episodes.name: Lucy and Danny Thomas
episodes.overview: Lucy schemes with a starving artist to fake his death, hoping his paintings will begin to sell.

episodes.name: The Big Game
episodes.overview: Uncle Harry books OJ Simpson as a guest speaker for the Beverly Hills Chamber of Commerce.

episodes.name: Lucy, the Peacemaker
episodes.overview: Lucy attempts to resolve the marriage separation between Eydie Gorme and Steve Lawrence.

episodes.name: Lucy the Wealthy Widow
episodes.overview: Lucy schemes to borrow money from a bank to redecorate the Unique Employment Agency.

episodes.name: The Bow-Wow Boutique
episodes.overview: Lucy and Kim work on weekends at a pet store.

episodes.name: Lucy Gives Eddie Albert the Old Song and Dance
episodes.overview: Lucy is mistaken for a stalker.

episodes.name: Lucy's Tenant
episodes.overview: Lucy rents out Kim's room, but soon chooses to break the lease.

episodes.name: Lucy and Joan Rivers Do Jury Duty
episodes.overview: Lucy disagrees with other jurist in court, and holds up proceedings.

episodes.name: Tipsy Through the Tulips
episodes.overview: Lucy attempts to keep an author sober, but discovers he has booze hidden everywhere.

episodes.name: The Carters Meet Frankie Avalon
episodes.overview: Kim and Frankie Avalon imitate Sonny & Cher in a local competition.

episodes.name: Harry Catches Gold Fever
episodes.overview: The family searches for gold.

episodes.name: Lucy and Chuck Connors Have a Surprise Slumber Party
episodes.overview: Lucy is banished from her own home after it is rented by a movie production company.  When all seems clear, Lucy returns to find Chuck Connors in her bed.

episodes.name: Lucy Plays Cops and Robbers
episodes.overview: Lucy chairs a neighborhood watch program started due to a string of recent robberies.  Lucy runs amok.

episodes.name: Lucy is a Bird Sitter
episodes.overview: Lucy is enlisted by Harry to sit for a rare New Guinea Weewawk.  Unfortunately, Lucy looses the bird.

episodes.name: Meanwhile, Back at the Office
episodes.overview: Harry sells the agency, but regrets it.  Lucy schemes to get the agency back for Uncle Harry.

episodes.name: Lucy is N.G. as an R.N.
episodes.overview: Lucy must care for Uncle Harry, Kim, and Mary Jane at the same time.

episodes.name: Lucy, the Sheriff
episodes.overview: A small Montana town contacts Lucy, who's great grandmother was a former sheriff, to be honored during a week long festival.

episodes.name: Milton Berle is the Life of the Party
episodes.overview: Chastized for her boring parties, Lucy wins a celebrity charity auction, enlisting Milton Berle as a guest for her next party.

episodes.name: Mary Jane's Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Mary Jane finally catches a man.  Unfortunately, the new boyfriend makes a play for Lucy.

episodes.name: Lucy and Phil Harris Strike Up the Band
episodes.overview: Lucy gets minorities hired in a band, but upsets women's rights group for not hiring any female musicians . . . . . . guess who fills in as a female vocalist?!

episodes.name: Lucy Carter Meets Lucille Ball
episodes.overview: Lucy enters a Lucille Ball lookalike contest and meets Lucille Ball.

episodes.name: Where is My Wandering Mother Tonight?
episodes.overview: Spending the weekend with Kim, Lucy overhears her daughter complaining about her visit and leaves.

episodes.name: Lucy Fights the System
episodes.overview: When a middle aged waitress is fired solely based on her age, Lucy and Kim scheme to cause chaos for the restaurant manager.
